properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 2 at 8:57AM CST until January 7 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Buttahatchie River and Tombigbee
River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Tombigbee River at Bigbee
* from Friday, January 3, until Monday, January 6.
* At 8 AM Thursday the stage was 8.8 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 18.5 feet on Saturday, January 4.
* Flood stage is 14.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage late tonight, cresting near
18.5 feet Friday evening. The river is forecast to fall below
flood stage Monday, January 6.
* At 18.0 feet...Water is flowing over Hood Road. The flood plain
between Town Creek and the Tombigbee River is flooded. Extensive
agricultural flooding is occurring along Highway 6 near Bigbee.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued this evening or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
